title: Topic 01 Question 09
body: You are creating the security recommendations for an Azure App Service web app named App1. App1 has the following specifications:
✑ Users will request access to App1 through the My Apps portal. A human resources manager will approve the requests.
✑ Users will authenticate by using Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) user accounts.
You need to recommend an access security architecture for App1.
What should you include in the recommendation? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
